title: Lifeline生命线
description: Lifeline - 你的互联网出发锚点
keywords: 从这里开始，探索、创造、连接你的无限宇宙。
headerContent:
<head>
    <style>
        * {
            margin: 0;
            padding: 0;
            box-sizing: border-box;
            font-family: 'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif;
        }
        body {
            background-color: #f8f9fa;
            color: #333;
            line-height: 1.6;
            padding: 20px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            min-height: 100vh;
            justify-content: space-between;
        }
        .container {
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
        }
        .content {
            background: white;
            padding: 30px;
            border-radius: 10px;
            box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.08);
            margin-bottom: 30px;
        }
        h1 {
            color: #2c3e50;
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        p {
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }
        .footer {
            background: #2c3e50;
            color: #ecf0f1;
            padding: 25px 0;
            text-align: center;
            border-radius: 10px;
            margin-top: auto;
        }
        .footer-content {
            max-width: 800px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            padding: 0 20px;
        }
        .footer-stats {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            gap: 20px;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
        }
        .stat-box {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            padding: 10px 15px;
            border-radius: 6px;
            min-width: 150px;
        }
        .footer-links {
            margin: 15px 0;
        }
        .footer-links a {
            color: #3498db;
            text-decoration: none;
            margin: 0 10px;
            transition: color 0.3s;
        }
        .footer-links a:hover {
            color: #1abc9c;
            text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .copyright {
            margin-top: 15px;
            font-size: 0.9em;
            color: #bdc3c7;
        }
        .acknowledgment {
            margin-top: 10px;
            padding-top: 10px;
            border-top: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
        }
        @media (max-width: 600px) {
            .footer-stats {
                flex-direction: column;
                align-items: center;
            }
            .stat-box {
                width: 100%;
                max-width: 250px;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
footerContent:
收录网站: ${total}
运营年份: 2023-${year}
域名: ${hostname}
申请收录 使用指南 关于我们 联系方式
Lifeline(生命线) © 2023-${year} , 经世致用-自强不息
鸣谢：发现导航
simThemeDesc: 这里收录多达 ${total} 个优质网站， 助您工作、学习和生活
